title: Implement secure login system
description: As a customer, I want a secure login system, so that I can access my account safely.
attributes_and_rules: Must support multi-factor authentication methods like OTP, email verification, or biometric options. Adhere to banking data security and privacy standards.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Login system supports OTP, email verification, and biometric options. 2. All login attempts are logged and monitored for security.
test_cases: Given I have the correct login credentials, When I attempt to log in, Then I should be prompted for multi-factor authentication.

title: Role-based access control
description: As a system admin, I want a role-based access control system, so that users can only access authorized services.
attributes_and_rules: Define user roles and permissions. Ensure each user can only access services they are authorized for, based on their profile.
acceptance_criteria: 1. User permissions are correctly defined. 2. Access to services is restricted based on user roles.
test_cases: Given I am logged in as a user with a specific role, When I attempt to access a restricted service, Then I should be denied access if my role does not have the required permissions.

title: Design responsive user interface
description: As a user, I want a responsive user interface, so that I can have a consistent experience across different devices.
attributes_and_rules: Must support desktop, tablet, and mobile platforms. Ensure visual consistency and accessibility for all users.
acceptance_criteria: 1. User interface adapts to different screen sizes. 2. Elements are visually consistent and accessible.
test_cases: Given I am using the portal on different devices, When I navigate through the interface, Then the layout should adjust and remain user-friendly.

title: Conduct usability testing
description: As a product manager, I want usability testing performed, so that navigation and interactive components are optimized.
attributes_and_rules: Conduct usability tests with users of varying proficiency levels. Prioritize navigation efficiency and page loading times.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Usability test results are collected and analyzed. 2. Identified issues are resolved to optimize user experience.
test_cases: Given the interface is developed, When usability tests are conducted, Then feedback should lead to measurable improvements in navigation and interaction.

title: Create customized dashboard
description: As a user, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I can see relevant banking products and services.
attributes_and_rules: Tailor information based on user's profile, eligibility, and preferences. Securely fetch data in real-time.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Dashboard displays user-specific data. 2. Data is fetched securely in real-time.
test_cases: Given I am logged in, When I view my dashboard, Then the content should be personalized based on my profile.

title: Integrate product recommendations
description: As a customer, I want product recommendations, so that I can find products suited to my needs.
attributes_and_rules: Use recommendation logic based on user profile. Recommendations should align with customer's portfolio.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Relevant product recommendations are displayed. 2. Recommendations are tailored to user's profile.
test_cases: Given I have specific needs, When I access the dashboard, Then relevant product recommendations should be displayed.
